document.full_text: suspected islamist militants on friday opened fire on a group of pakistani shi'ites in the town of quetta, killing at least eight and wounding 15, police said, the first major violent incident since the death of osama bin laden.
document.title: pakistani shi'ites killed in suspected militant attack
lines_and_colors: suspected islamist militants on friday opened fire on a group of pakistani shi'ites in the town of quetta, killing at least eight and wounding 15, police said, the first major violent incident since the death of osama bin laden.
